reviews.text: Stayed here for one nite as part of a friends stag in August 2009.
reviews.title: Great Location..Terrible Value..Very Average

reviews.text: Firstly, 3 of us stayed in a tiny dingy room, with one single bed and one double...and were charged €65 each...€195 for the room...I would put this as the worst value i have ever encountered for any accomodationa anywhere in the world...in these times, this is simply outrageous, when you can stay in any of the decent hotels in Kilkenny for €70 or €80 per room per nite.
reviews.title: worst ever attitude!

likes.disliked: — tiny, dirty basic and way overpriced

reviews.text: OK, it was very handy to get grub and a couple of pints before hitting the town, and then having the residents bar after the niteclub, but this doesnt warrant the ridiculous rate, for what was a very grubby B&B.
reviews.title: Worst Value B & B Ever

reviews.text: I could not recommend this place, unless the rate was substantially reduced.
reviews.title: Okay, but way too expensive

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hen party of about 25. booked in friday night and others on sat night. rooms tiny with basic facilities, actually think i got bitten by bed bug...uugh we had dinner at the 'resteraunt' which was not great, starter of brie and garlic chicken salad was missing the brie and the garlic and contained just a small few pieces of dried chicken over limp lettuce. Main course was worse with pasta swimming in cream, and to top it off desert was profitteroles that were frozen solid. All through dinner service the owner was in foul humour and when we dared complain he was arrogant and rude. This is a place I would not recommend to anyone, for the bad attitude alone.
reviews.title: Total Nightmare

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here and loved it (maybe things have improved from older posts).
reviews.title: Great Location, We Loved It!

reviews.text: Location is awesome... right in the heart of Kilkenny!
reviews.title: Good value in centre of kilkenny

likes.disliked: — Manager was a bit off in the morning

reviews.title: lacking in personality!!
reviews.text: Our room was very large (don't know what other poster was talking about)... we were given a double and twin bed in our large room, which was around 80 euros (November). The bathrooms were nice enough... clean.
